text: Ibuka ubwo Allah yavugaga ati “Yewe Issa (Yesu)! Mu by’ukuri, njye ngiye gushyira iherezo ku gihe cyawe (cyo kuba ku isi, ngusinzirize) maze nkuzamure iwanjye, ngukize abahakanyi, kandi abagukurikiye nzabarutisha abahakanye kugeza ku munsi w’imperuka. Hanyuma muzagaruka iwanjye maze mbakiranure mu byo mutavugagaho rumwe.”
